verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: that he would proceed with tariffs on $ 50 billion in Chinese imports and introduce new limits on Chinese investment in U.S. high - tech industries as part of a broad campaign to crack down on Chinese acquisition of U.S.] technology.</p >

< p > President Trump said Tuesday that he [V: would] proceed with tariffs on $ 50 billion in Chinese imports and introduce new limits on Chinese investment in U.S. high - tech industries as part of a broad campaign to crack down on Chinese acquisition of U.S. technology.</p >

< p > President Trump said Tuesday that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: proceed] [ARG1: with tariffs on $ 50 billion in Chinese imports] and introduce new limits on Chinese investment in U.S. high - tech industries as part of a broad campaign to crack down on Chinese acquisition of U.S. technology.</p >

< p > President Trump said Tuesday that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] proceed with tariffs on $ 50 billion in Chinese imports and [V: introduce] [ARG1: new limits on Chinese investment in U.S. high - tech industries] [ARGM-ADV: as part of a broad campaign to crack down on Chinese acquisition of U.S.] technology.</p >

< p > President Trump said Tuesday that he would proceed with tariffs on $ 50 billion in Chinese imports and introduce new limits on Chinese investment in U.S. high - tech industries as part of [ARG0: a broad campaign] to [V: crack] down [ARG1: on Chinese acquisition of U.S.] technology.</p >
